body_html:
Are you using MKL by any chance? There's known bad interaction between MKL and TensorFlow (ie, see #11724)

Try np.__config__.get_info("lapack_mkl_info") to see if MKL is there

MKL issue might be solved by setting export MKL_NUM_THREADS="1"
body_text:
Are you using MKL by any chance? There's known bad interaction between MKL and TensorFlow (ie, see #11724)
Try np.__config__.get_info("lapack_mkl_info") to see if MKL is there
MKL issue might be solved by setting export MKL_NUM_THREADS="1"
body:
Are you using MKL by any chance? There's known bad interaction between MKL and TensorFlow (ie, see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/11724)

Try `np.__config__.get_info("lapack_mkl_info")` to see if MKL is there

MKL issue might be solved by setting `export MKL_NUM_THREADS="1"`
